casebody.data:
Courtnay MONTGOMERY, Appellant,
v.
The NORTHERN TRUST COMPANY and Hilda Santana, as Co-Trustees of the Mary M. Montgomery Trust Dated July 28, 2006, as amended, and John Cramer and John Neason, as Co-Guardians of Mary M. Montgomery, Appellees. No. 4D17-1346 District Court of Appeal of Florida, Fourth District. [January 25, 2018]

DECISION WITHOUT PUBLISHED OPINION

Affirmed.
